summary: Adds a spell that can turn enemies into chickens.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a \"Transmogrify\" spell to the game, which transforms your target into a chicken for 30 seconds or until they take damage. Useful for getting an enemy to stop attacking you long enough to recover or run away.

The Spell Tome can be found as loot or purchased from vendors. Farengar in Dragonsreach and Brelyna in the College of Winterhold also both have copies on them, though getting it from the latter requires pickpocketing.

Known Issues:
-Doesn\'t work on guards. If you try this spell on a guard, it will summon a chicken instead.
author: R-Taco
